heading.emphasis:
Key to
Petrocosmea dejiangensis
and its alliance

paragraph.keyLead:
2 Corolla light green, leaf blade 3–7 mm long..................................................
P. viridis Han & Yan Liu
in
Han et al. (2017
: e01566)

5 Leaf blades base peltate .............................................................
P. huanjiangensis Yan Liu & W.B.Xu
in
Xu et al. (2011: 385–387)

8 Leaf blades base cuneate .......................................................
P. chiwui M.Q.Han, H.Jiang & Yan Liu
in
Jiang et al. (2020
: e02847)

– Leaf blades base rounded .............................................
P. rotundifolia M.Q.Han, H.Jiang & Yan Liu
in
Jiang et al. (2020
: e02847)

9 Adaxial leaf blades surfaces densely brownish yellow appressed puberulent .....................
P. sericea C.Y.Wu ex Li (1983: 18–27)
– Adaxial leaf blades surfaces densely or sparsely erect pilose, with or without pustulate hairs at the base ....................................10

10 Filaments villous .............
P. shilinensis Y.M.Shui & H.T.Zhao var. changhuensis T.F.Lü & Y.Z.Wang
in Li et al. (2019: 145–158)

– Filaments white, lateral lobes of abaxial corolla lip triangular ...................................
P. minor Hemsley
in Hooker (1899 : pl. 2600)

13 Filaments glabrous or sparsely pilose...........................................
P. leiandra ( Wang 1984: 9–35 ) Z.J.Qiu
in Qiu & Liu (2015: 116)

14 Leaf blades 50–150 mm long ........................................................
P. funingensis Qiang Zhang & B.Pan
in
Zhang et al. (2013: 5–8)

keyStep.keyLead:
– Anthers widely triangular ...............................................
P. qiruniae M.Q.Han, Li Bing Zhang & Yan Liu
in
Han et al. (2019: 1–5)

paragraph.keyLead:
16 Apex of abaxial corolla lip lobes reflexed....................................................
P. duyunensis Sheng H.Tang
in
Tang et al. (2021: 1–8)

17 Petioles densely villous and golden-brown glandular puberulent................................
P. adenophora Huang & Xin (2021
: e02944)

19 Style bending downward at base .......................................................
P. longituba M.Q.Han & Yan Liu
in Li et al. (2019: 145–158)

21 Stigma apex rounded, two dark blue-purple stripes inside the entire corolla tube..........
P. dejiangensis Sheng H.Tang & Jian Xu

– Stigma apex flat, two purple spots inside the tube under stamens ...................
P. martini ( Léveillé 1903: 166 ) Léveillé (1911: 329)
